SELECT cs.fGroup AS "group", cs.fTerminalType AS "terminalType", SUM(IF(DATE_ADD(cs.fLastVisitTime, INTERVAL IF(10 > cs.fPageNo * 3, 15, cs.fPageNo * 3 + 5) MINUTE) < NOW(), 1, 0)) AS 'unworkMachineCount', SUM(cs.fIdleTotalMinutes) AS "idleTotalMinutes", COUNT(1) AS 'totalMachineCount' FROM t_machine_info cs WHERE cs.fValid = 1
AND cs.fTerminalType = #{criteria.terminalType}
AND cs.fGroup like '${criteria.groupName}%' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_customer_keyword ck WHERE ck.fType = #{criteria.entryType} AND ck.fOptimizeGroupName like '${criteria.groupName}%')
GROUP BY cs.fGroup, cs.fTerminalType ORDER BY cs.fGroup

SELECT cs.fClientIDPrefix as clientIDPrefix, cs.fTerminalType as type, cs.fCity as city, COUNT(1) as 'count', cs.fSwitchGroupName as 'switchGroupName' FROM t_machine_info cs cs.fValid = 1 AND cs.fClientIDPrefix LIKE '%${clientIDPrefix}%' AND cs.fCity LIKE '%${city}%' AND cs.fSwitchGroupName LIKE '%${switchGroupName}%'
GROUP BY cs.fClientIDPrefix, cs.fTerminalType, cs.fCity, cs.fSwitchGroupName ORDER BY cs.fClientIDPrefix

SELECT cs.fGroup as 'group', cs.fTerminalType as terminalType, COUNT(1) AS 'count' FROM t_machine_info cs
and cs.fGroup LIKE '%${machineInfoGroupStatCriteria.groupName}%'
and cs.fTerminalType = #{machineInfoGroupStatCriteria.terminalType}
GROUP BY cs.fGroup, cs.fTerminalType ORDER BY cs.fGroup

SELECT cs.fClientID AS "clientID", cs.fTerminalType AS "terminalType", cs.fVPSBackendSystemComputerID AS "vPSBackendSystemComputerID", cs.fContinuousFailCount AS "continuousFailCount", cs.fLastVisitTime AS "lastVisitTime", cs.fPageNo AS "pageNo", cs.fHost AS "host", cs.fPort AS "port", cs.fUserName AS "userName", cs.fPassword AS "password", cs.fRestartStatus AS "restartStatus" FROM t_machine_info cs WHERE fTenMinsLastVisitTime < NOW() and fValid = 1 AND fRestartStatus = 'restarting' AND fThreeMinsRestartTime < NOW() AND fStartUpStatus = 'Completed' AND fHost > '' order by fRestartOrderingTime limit 1

SELECT cs.fClientID AS "clientID", cs.fTerminalType AS "terminalType", cs.fVPSBackendSystemComputerID AS "vPSBackendSystemComputerID", cs.fContinuousFailCount AS "continuousFailCount", cs.fLastVisitTime AS "lastVisitTime", cs.fPageNo AS "pageNo", cs.fRestartStatus AS "restartStatus" FROM t_machine_info cs WHERE (fContinuousFailCount > 5 OR fTenMinsLastVisitTime < NOW()) AND fTenMinsRestartTime < NOW() and fRemainingKeyword = 1 AND fStartUpStatus = 'Completed' AND fGroup > '' AND fValid = 1 AND fHost > '' order by fRestartOrderingTime limit 1
